data.what_is: AnyFunnels platform helps you capture leads, track website visits, send more personalized emails, automate customer journey & accelerate growth.
data.product_description: AnyFunnels platform helps you capture leads, track website visits, send more personalized emails, automate customer journey & accelerate growth.

initial_reviews.review_title: New but a must try marketing automation & email tool (Specially for enterprises)
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about AnyFunnels platform?
The E-mail marketing system & the mailing list function is something I use mostly being into digital marketing. I have also subscriber emails to send, this software really helped me in automating that effectively.

What do you dislike about AnyFunnels platform?
Very new to this tool & haven't explored much yet. Also haven't found it as of now. Small bug fixes are required, that I am sure the backend or the tech team can work upon.

Recommendations to others considering AnyFunnels platform:
Are you into digital marketing & campaigns for small enterprises & businesses? If yes, try this software for one of the best automation functions.

What problems is AnyFunnels platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Anyfunnels helped me majorly in sending personalized & scheduled emails, automating marketing funnels, and capturing new leads from Facebook, ads, & websites. Also, this has helped me through mailing list management.
